title: Ex-Trump Iran Envoy Brian Hook Joins Cerberus
sub_head: Mr. Hook becomes vice chairman of the private-equity firm’s international arm
body:
Former State Department Iran envoy Brian Hook has joined private-equity firm Cerberus Capital Management to help oversee international investments, the asset manager said Monday.
Mr. Hook was named vice chairman of Cerberus Global Investments LLC, the New York firm’s affiliate focused on international business. He will be working under former U.S. Vice President Dan Quayle, who has been with the private-equity firm for more than two decades and is chairman of the global arm.
